title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 202.4 - Slow-moving vehicles
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 202.4 - Slow-moving vehicles

State Regulations

No unusual slow-moving vehicles and no vehicles which, for
that or any other reason, are likely to cause undue delay or interference with
traffic, are permitted on any part of the authority facilities, except upon the
prior approval of the authority and only at such times and under such
circumstances that no undue delay in traffic will occur. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
202.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
